desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 10th IFIP WG 11.8 World Conference on Security Education, WISE 10, held in Rome, Italy, in May 2017.

details.authors: Matt Bishop, Lynn Futcher, Natalia Miloslavskaya, Marianthi Theocharidou

title: Information Security Education for a Global Digital Society: 10th IFIP WG 11.8 World Conference, WISE 10, Rome, Italy, May 29-31, 2017, Proceedings … in Information and Communication Technology)
